comment.brief: Measures the acceleration force in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, and z), including the force of gravity (9.81 m/s2)
comment.full: Measures the acceleration force in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, and z), including the force of gravity (9.81 m/s2)

comment.brief: Measures a device's rate of rotation in rad/s around each of the three physical axes (x, y, and z)
comment.full: Measures a device's rate of rotation in rad/s around each of the three physical axes (x, y, and z)

comment.brief: Measures the ambient geomagnetic field for all three physical axes (x, y, z) in μT
comment.full: Measures the ambient geomagnetic field for all three physical axes (x, y, z) in μT

comment.brief: Measures the force of gravity in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, z).
comment.full: Measures the force of gravity in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, z).

comment.brief: Measures the acceleration force in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, and z), excluding the force of gravity.
comment.full: Measures the acceleration force in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, and z), excluding the force of gravity.

comment.brief: Measures the orientation of a device by providing the three elements of the device's rotation vector.
comment.full: Measures the orientation of a device by providing the three elements of the device's rotation vector.

comment.brief: Number of steps taken by the user since the last reboot while the sensor was activated.
comment.full: Number of steps taken by the user since the last reboot while the sensor was activated.

comment.brief: Measures the ambient air pressure in hPa or mbar.
comment.full: Measures the ambient air pressure in hPa or mbar.

syntax.uno: public intrinsic static generated Fuse.Sensor.SensorType op_BitwiseAnd(Fuse.Sensor.SensorType left, Fuse.Sensor.SensorType right) {}
